column4: Hi, i used checkinstall to install compiled software.  how can I tell apt to not try and "update" it?
After you open aptitude, find the program, then press "h" on it. It will hold.
even better.  that wiki page is rough
hit 'q' to quit..  still have update blinking on gnome bar.  is that just a cache issue?
q to quit, then y choose Yes quit
Press Ctrl+L to clear your screen
no dice.  Update manager still wants ffmpeg
Is it still trying to update ffmpeg?
